preparation.raw_text:
1. In a fume hood, carefully weigh 30 grams of Beryllium Sulfide and 120 grams of Titanium Dioxide. 
 2. In a separate container, mix 50 grams of the binder with 10 grams of hardener. 
 3. Gradually add the powdered mixture (Be2S6 and TiO2) to the binder mixture while stirring continuously to ensure uniform consistency.
